        Description copied from interface: OrientDBInternal
        Drop a database
        Specified by:
        drop in interface OrientDBInternal
        Overrides:
        drop in class OrientDBEmbedded
        Parameters:
        name - database name
        user - the username of a user allowed to drop a database, in case of remote is a server user for embedded it can be left empty
        password - the password relative to the user

        Parameters:

        the opened database
